sections.heading: of State; Auditor of Public Accounts; State Treasurer; Lieutenant Governor; salaries
sections.text: Until January 4, 2007, there shall be paid as salaries to certain constitutional officers as follows: Secretary of State, the sum of sixty-five thousand dollars per year; Auditor of Public Accounts, the sum of sixty
